notes_translated.fr: Ces donnees decrivent le processus d'examen et les decisions finales concernant les dossiers a l'egard desquels le ministere des Affaires municipales et du Logement est l'autorite approbatrice. Les donnees comprennent les renseignements suivants (le cas echeant) : * Numero de dossier * Type de dossier * Municipalite * Date de reception * Date d'achevement * Date d'echeance de la decision * Region du bureau des services aux municipalites * Date de la decision * Type de decision * PIN * Numero de parcelle * Lot * Section * Concession * Canton geographique * Numero du plan enregistre * Numero du lot sur le plan enregistre * Type de lot sur le plan enregistre * Numero du plan de reference * Adresse municipale *[PIN]: Property Identification Number
notes_translated.en: This data tracks the review and final decisions for files where the Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing is the planning approval authority. Dataset includes the following information (where available): * Case Number * Case Type * Municipality * Received Date * Complete Date * Decision Due Date * Municipal Services Office (MSO) Region * Decision Date * Decision Type * PIN * Parcel Number * Lot * Section * Concession * Geographic Township * Registered Plan Number * Registered Plan Lot Number * Registered Plan Lot Type * Reference Plan Number * Municipal Address *[PIN]: Property Identification Number
